about_the_game:
▶Synopsis

The unknown curse that befell me took away everything I cherished—my bright personality, the hobbies I enjoyed, my cheerful academy life, and even... my beloved parents.

Nine years have passed since that fateful day. For the first time, I returned to the ruins of the house where I once lived with my parents.

And there, I encountered three men. Sensing an unusually dangerous atmosphere, I hastily left the place.

But soon after, I discovered a shocking truth. My goodness, those three men were the leaders of the divine organizations!

Besides, the professor who disliked me at the academy suddenly offers to write me a recommendation letter to join one of these divine organizations.

Amid the confusion of these inexplicable events, a thought crossed my mind: If they're the leaders of the divine organizations, maybe they can lift the curse placed upon me.

So, I made a decision. No matter what it takes, I'll confront them and rid myself of this curse.

▶Characters

Uria Mahel

The head of the Divine Ministry, who helps me without hesitation as I struggle to adapt.

He appears to be polite and kind-hearted to everyone, even in his top position... But what is this strange sense of unease I feel behind his kindness?

Haize Kareuo

A maverick who acts solely according to his own will... and yet, he is the head of the Reaper Corps.

He’s so impulsive and spontaneous that it’s quite challenging to keep up with his mood. But why does he keep holding me back every time I try to leave?

Ismei Harein

The head of the Holy Knights, who carries out every action according to strict rules.

He’s especially harsh with me, often scolding me for my frequent mistakes. It might be better if he just cast me aside, so why does he always try to keep me by his side?

▶What you can expect from 'Eternal Glory'

'Eternal Glory' is a fantasy otome game in the format of a visual novel.

After playing through the common prologue, you’ll dive into individual routes and explore the stories of these three men!

Enjoy over 30 illustrations and a deeply engaging narrative.

▶What you can expect from 'Eternal Glory'

'Eternal Glory' is a fantasy otome game in the format of a visual novel.

After playing through the common prologue, you’ll dive into individual routes and explore the stories of these three men!

Enjoy over 30 illustrations and a deeply engaging narrative.

▶About System

-Each character has an individual route.

-After completing the common prologue, you’ll proceed to the unique story of each character.

-Each character’s route consists of more than 10 chapters, including the prologue.

-Apart from the prologue, each chapter will present two dialogue choices. One will raise affection, and the other will lower it.

-Choosing an affection-up option will turn the chapter’s UI red, while choosing an affection-down option will turn it blue.

-If you select five or more happy ending options out of nine chapters, you’ll achieve a happy ending. Conversely, if you choose five or more bad ending options, a bad ending will unfold.

-Once a story is unlocked, you can revisit it anytime.

-If you’ve seen the happy ending and want to see the bad ending, you can enter the existing story and change your choices to achieve five or more bad ending selections.

-Additionally, 'Eternal Glory' features a unique save system.

-Instead of slots, each chapter has its own quick save/load function, so please keep this in mind.

[Demo Version Guide]

▶Uria Character: Playable up to Chapter 2.

▶Haize Character: Playable up to Chapter 1.

▶Ismei Character: Playable up to Chapter 2.

▶Character CG Gallery/Save, Load Function/Setting Function are activated.

[Credits]

-music by audionautix

-backgrounds by Eberouge Background Image Pack 2&3 © Five Happiness Co., Ltd./Pixabay/Unsplash
